metadata.title: CVE-2024-0409 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the X.Org server. The cursor code in both Xephyr andXwayland uses the wrong type of private at creation. It uses the cursorbits type with the cursor as private, and when initiating the cursor, thatoverwrites the XSELINUX context.

criterions.comment: xorg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
